name: Project: Pizza
description:
Compatible with Oculus Devices. Make Pizza in VR!  

The objective is to make the requested pizza, with the included ingredients that was stated.

5 Pizzas, 5 Toppings and a Whole Lot of Fun! Making a Mistake Costs!

Try not to have to use the reset button or you could lose everything, even if it's the only way go to back.

Cartoon Style!

Why not make pizza in  cat mittens, in a simplistic broad design?
